headline.main: Tovah Feldshuh at Home on the Upper West Side

snippet: The actor, who stars in the AMC horror series “The Walking Dead,” lives with her husband, Andrew H. Levy, a lawyer.
abstract: Actress and singer Tovah Feldshuh loves her apartment on Upper West Side with sweeping views of Central Park's reservoir and lake, and full of furnishings with sentimental value.
lead_paragraph: The actor, who stars in the AMC horror series “The Walking Dead,” lives with her husband, Andrew H. Levy, a lawyer.
